definition: to press down/to calm/to subdue/to suppress/to guard/garrison/small town/to cool or chill (food or drinks)
to flow/to disseminate/to circulate or spread/to move or drift/to degenerate/to banish or send into exile/stream of water or sth resembling one/class, rate or grade

sentences.english: If not ventilated properly, their ballast circuitry can get fried enough to fail.
sentences.chinese: 如果通風不當，它們的鎮流器電路會火燙到失效。

sentences.english: Sound generated by the vibration of laminations in the electromagnetic field that transforms the current for discharge lamp use.
sentences.chinese: 由電感鎮流器中鐵芯片的震動所產生的聲音。

sentences.english: The main methods are also put forward to handle acoustic resonance with electronic ballast.
sentences.chinese: 並分析總結了電子鎮流器解決聲共振問題的方法。

sentences.english: Railway ballast will be loaded onto ballast trains at an established ballast siding.
sentences.chinese: 鐵路道碴，將載入碴列車在一個既定的鎮流器偏袒。

sentences.english: The forecast of dimmable electronic ballast is also presented.
sentences.chinese: 最後給出了可調光電子鎮流器的前景預測。

sentences.english: The ballast tanks are complete and have been installed.
sentences.chinese: 鎮流器坦克是完整的和已安裝的。

sentences.english: A novel UHF electronic ballast with dimming feature is proposed in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 本文提出了一種新型可調光的超高頻電子鎮流器。

sentences.english: Perform crane ballast sequence, or any other sequence.
sentences.chinese: 執行起重機鎮流器序列，或任何其他序列。

sentences.english: Arc lamps require a current-limiting ballast .
sentences.chinese: 弧光燈需要一個限流鎮流器。

sentences.english: Arc lamps require a current- limiting ballast.
sentences.chinese: 弧光燈需要一個限流鎮流器。

sentences.english: No ballasts, cooling fans or reflectors needed.
sentences.chinese: 沒有鎮流器，散熱風扇或反射器所需要的。

sentences.english: The Electronic BaLlast is a kind of electronic equipments unitizing the ignoring and current limiting .
sentences.chinese: 電子鎮流器是集點燃與限流爲一體的電子裝置。

sentences.english: Lamp life depends on whether the start ballast is program or instant.
sentences.chinese: 燈壽命取決於啓動鎮流器是程序式的還是瞬時的。

sentences.english: The ballast and trigger are all mounted inside the lamp body that's easy for installation.
sentences.chinese: 鎮流器，觸發器等均裝在燈體內，安裝簡單方便。

sentences.english: The system of Automotive head lamp electronic ballast is one of the most popular research subjects.
sentences.chinese: 目前高強度汽車頭燈電子鎮流器系統是研究熱點之一。

sentences.english: The utility model relates to a low-tension sodium lamp electronic ballast, belonging to the field of lighting technology.
sentences.chinese: 本實用新型低壓鈉燈電子鎮流器，屬於照明技術領域。
